column1: 2001-03: The Lord of the Rings (film series):
:Peter Jacksons Isengard is reflective of J.R.R. Tolkien descriptions of the fortress.
1988: J.R.R. Tolkiens War in Middle Earth:
:Isengard is one of the many battlefields of this game.
2011: The Lord of the Rings Online: Rise of Isengard:
:Isengard is a new region that will be released in the new expansion The Lord of the Rings Online: Rise of Isengard.
